name: Damen Jackson
description:
Flexible, Engaged, Versatile. And Fun.
Damen Jackson is a brand strategy and design agency located in Chicago’s west loop. Since we opened in 1998, we have focused on providing 360° brand support to our clients– from name generation to consumer packaging, product design and digital development. We do this by creating meaningful brand stories, then finding effective ways to tell them through images and messaging. 
Our key agency values are:
1. Fearlessness –We explore beyond the obvious to deliver truly unique, creative solutions
2. Relevance–We utilize insights to meaningfully connect our work to your audience 
3. Simplicity–We challenge ourselves to deliver a simple, memorable message
4. Integrity– We conduct business with the highest level of openness, honesty and transparency possible
For the past 18 years, we've been delivering powerful strategic design solutions to our clients. Damen Jackson is the agency partner you need.
READ MORE...
